Anietie Isong bụ onye Naijiria / Briten na-ede uri na akụkọ mkpirikpi.
Anietie Isong nwere PhD na New Media and Writing na Mahadum De Montfort, Leicester
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Ibadan na Mahadim Leicester ebe ọ gụrụ nkwurịta okwu
Isong malitere ọrụ ya na mgbasa ozi tupu ọ gbanwee na mmekọrịta ọha na eze

Ọrụ mbụ ya na-ede edemede maka redio gbanwere ka ọ bụrụ ihe a raara nye na ederede. N'ime abụ ya na akụkọ mkpirisi ya, o meriri ihe nrite abụ nke MUSON maka "These Many Rivers". O mechara kwado ihe nrite pụrụ iche na asọmpi Commonwealth Short Story maka "akụkọ Naijiria kacha mma" n'afọ 2010. O nwetakwara ihe nrite Olaudah Equiano maka akụkọ ifo na ihe nrite asọmpi odide Remember Oluwale.
Isong rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye na-ekwu okwu, onye njikwa mmekọrịta ọha na eze na onye nyocha na Europe, Middle East na Africa
Nwanne ya nke okenye, Emem Isong, bụ onye ama ama na-emeputa ihe na onye na-ede ihe nkiri maka ihe nkiri Nollywood.
Isong bụ Radio Sunrise na-enyocha nsogbu nrụrụ aka na ọrụ odeakụkọ ma kọwaa ya dị ka "ihe osise satirical nke Naịjirịa". Radio Sunrise meriri ihe nrite McKitterick nke afọ 2018.
